title: RAPHA trade team jerseys - SERIF - font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on both the bolder serif on top and the italic serif below.

Many thanks in advance for helping to identify these fonts!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110537im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%20(1)_3682.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo (1).JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110537/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%20(1)_2.JPG) | 1.81 MB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: This is Adobe Caslon ( [italics](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110537/http:/myfonts.us/td-Aduohy) and [semibold small caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110537/http:/myfonts.us/td-GtHpRw)).
